page.title: 13Twyning Parish Church
page.content:
On site of an{Anglo-Saxon}Church. {Norman}tower. P.C.C. has 15 members. 2 or 3 services are held on Sundays. {Average Attendance:}Morning,15; Evening,5; Family Eucharist and "Hymn-Sing" in village hall (1 per month),50. Vicar's only parish due to Deanery Synod work; he is Rural Dean. {Annual Costs:}c.Â£6,500 total: financed by Covenants, offerings, fund-raising. Current project is mains water into the church. An annual average of 3{weddings, 6{funerals}and 7{baptisms. Augmented choir sang Stainer's "Crucifixion" on Good Friday. Unaccompanied 4 part carols sung round village week before Christmas.
There is also a very active Inter- denominational{Chapel.
